title: Can I give improvement exam of cbse again, because due to some reasons I was unable to perform? - Quora
tags: Central Board of Secondary Education, India

response.answer_text: No you cannot give improvement exam again, Improvement can be given only in the consecutive year after boards and only once.But you can appear as a private candidate.But that wouldn't be counted as improvement.

Yes you can give. Forms will be out in August just fill up them and submit in your shcool. They'll tell you the whole procedure. You can also give improvement exam of particular subject or all. But remember, your marks in the improvement exams will be considered whenever you'll go for admissions.
